trans-unit.source: In the [Azure Management Portal], click your new Mobile Service or its cloud icon tab to go to the overview page.
trans-unit.target: In the [Azure Management Portal], click your new Mobile Service or its cloud icon tab to go to the overview page.

trans-unit.source: Under the **Get Started** section, and expand **Create a new iOS app**.
trans-unit.target: Under the **Get Started** section, and expand **Create a new iOS app**.

trans-unit.source: If you haven't already done so, download and install [Visual Studio Professional 2013](https://go.microsoft.com/fwLink/p/?LinkID=391934), or a later version.
trans-unit.target: If you haven't already done so, download and install [Visual Studio Professional 2013](https://go.microsoft.com/fwLink/p/?LinkID=391934), or a later version.

trans-unit.source: Click **Download** under **Download and publish your service to the cloud**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Download** under **Download and publish your service to the cloud**.

trans-unit.source: This downloads the Visual Studio project that implements your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: This downloads the Visual Studio project that implements your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Save the compressed project file to your local computer, and make a note of where you saved it.
trans-unit.target: Save the compressed project file to your local computer, and make a note of where you saved it.

trans-unit.source: Scroll down to the bottom of that **Get Started** section to the step titled **Download and publish your service to the cloud**.
trans-unit.target: Scroll down to the bottom of that **Get Started** section to the step titled **Download and publish your service to the cloud**.

trans-unit.source: Click the link shown in the screenshot below to download a publish profile file for the mobile service you just downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Click the link shown in the screenshot below to download a publish profile file for the mobile service you just downloaded.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Save the file in a safe place because it does contain sensitive information pertaining to your Azure account.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Save the file in a safe place because it does contain sensitive information pertaining to your Azure account.

trans-unit.source: You will delete this file after publishing the mobile service later in this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: You will delete this file after publishing the mobile service later in this tutorial.
